snippet: Endo International said on Wednesday that it had agreed to pay $830 million to resolve legal claims from women who say they were injured by transvaginal mesh devices.
abstract: Endo International says it has agreed to pay $830 million to resolve legal claims from women who say they were injured by transvaginal mesh devices; says agreement will cover most of the mesh litigation brought against its American Medical Systems subsidiary.
lead_paragraph: Endo International said on Wednesday that it had agreed to pay $830 million to resolve legal claims from women who say they were injured by transvaginal mesh devices.

headline.main: Endo to Pay $830 Million to Settle Claims Over Devices
headline.print_headline: Endo to Pay $830 Million to Settle Claims Over Devices
